00048 /*****************************************************************************\
00049  *
00050  *  File:  m_opti.c
00051  *
00052  *  Description:
00053  *      Performs machine level code optimization:
00054  *      1) common subexpression ellimination
00055  *      2) limited copy propogation (only R-R, R-M, M-R, M-M)
00056  *      3) dead code removal (unused operations, src1=dest)
00057  *
00058  *      This code is base-lined off the work developed by Scott Mahlke in
00059  *      l_basic_opti.c
00060  *
00061  *  Creation Date :  July 1991
00062  *
00063  *  Author:  Roger A. Bringmann
00064  *
00065  *  Revisions:
00066  *      Roger A. Bringmann, February 1993
00067  *      Modified to support new Lcode format.  Reduces memory requirements
00068  *      for a code generator.  Also, adds a more friendly interface for
00069  *      code generation.
00070  *
00071  *      (C) Copyright 1991, Roger A. Bringmann
00072  *      All rights granted to University of Illinois Board of Regents.
00073  *      All rights granted to AMD Inc.
00074  *
00075 \*****************************************************************************/
00076 /* 10/29/02 REK Adding config.h */
00077 #include <config.h>
00078 #include <Lcode/l_main.h>
00079 #include <Lcode/l_opti.h>
00080 #include <Lcode/m_opti.h>
00081 
00082 /* Variable initialization */
00083 int Mopti_imax_num_iterations = 10;
00084 int Mopti_omax_num_iterations = 10;
00085 int Mopti_init_performed = 0;
00086 
00087 /*
00088  *      Mopti Parameters
00089  */
00090 int Mopti_print_stats = 0;
00091 int Mopti_debug_copy_prop = 0;
00092 int Mopti_debug_common_subs = 0;
00093 int Mopti_debug_dead_code = 0;
00094 int Mopti_do_common_subs = 1;
00095 int Mopti_do_copy_prop = 1;
00096 int Mopti_do_dead_code = 1;
00097 
00098 
00099 void
00100 L_read_parm_mopti (Parm_Parse_Info * ppi)
00101 {
00102   L_read_parm_b (ppi, "print_stats", &Mopti_print_stats);
00103   L_read_parm_b (ppi, "debug_copy_prop", &Mopti_debug_copy_prop);
00104   L_read_parm_b (ppi, "debug_common_subs", &Mopti_debug_common_subs);
00105   L_read_parm_b (ppi, "debug_dead_code", &Mopti_debug_dead_code);
00106   L_read_parm_b (ppi, "do_common_subs", &Mopti_do_common_subs);
00107   L_read_parm_b (ppi, "do_copy_prop", &Mopti_do_copy_prop);
00108   L_read_parm_b (ppi, "do_dead_code", &Mopti_do_dead_code);
00109 
00110   /* This prevents the code from reperforming initialization again */
00111   Mopti_init_performed = 1;
00112 }
00113 
00114 void
00115 Mopti_init (Parm_Macro_List * command_line_macro_list)
00116 {
00117   /* Load the parameters specific to Lcode code generation */
00118   L_load_parameters (L_parm_file, command_line_macro_list,
00119                      "(Mopti", L_read_parm_mopti);
00120 }
00121 
00122 
00123 void
00124 Mopti_perform_optimizations (L_Func * fn,
00125                              Parm_Macro_List * command_line_macro_list)
00126 {
00127   int j, k, change, common_subs, copy_prop, dead_code, c1 = 0, c2 = 0, c3 = 0;
00128   L_Cb *cb;
00129 
00130   if (!Mopti_init_performed)
00131     {
00132       Mopti_init (command_line_macro_list);
00133     }
00134 
00135   if (Mopti_print_stats)
00136     {
00137       fprintf (stderr, "  Machine Level Code Optimizations\n");
00138       fprintf (stderr, "  ======================================\n");
00139     }
00140 
00141   k = 0;
00142   common_subs = copy_prop = dead_code = 0;
00143 
00144   if (Mopti_do_dead_code)
00145     L_split_pred_defines (fn);
00146 
00147   do
00148     {
00149       change = 0;
00150 
00151       L_do_flow_analysis (fn, LIVE_VARIABLE);
00152 
00153       if (Mopti_do_dead_code)
00154         {
00155           for (cb = fn->first_cb; cb != NULL; cb = cb->next_cb)
00156             {
00157               /* Handle dead code elimination */
00158               c3 = L_local_dead_code_removal (cb)
00159                 + L_global_dead_code_removal (cb);
00160               dead_code += c3;
00161               change += c3;
00162             }
00163         }
00164 
00165       PG_setup_pred_graph (fn);
00166 
00167       for (cb = fn->first_cb; cb != NULL; cb = cb->next_cb)
00168         {
00169           j = 0;
00170 
00171           do
00172             {
00173               if (Mopti_do_common_subs)
00174                 {
00175                   /* Handle common sub-expression elimination */
00176                   c1 = L_local_common_subexpression (cb,
00177                                                      L_COMMON_SUB_MOVES_WITH_INT_CONSTANT
00178                                                      |
00179                                                      L_COMMON_SUB_MOVES_WITH_FLT_CONSTANT
00180                                                      |
00181                                                      L_COMMON_SUB_MOVES_WITH_LABEL_CONSTANT
00182                                                      |
00183                                                      L_COMMON_SUB_MOVES_WITH_STRING_CONSTANT);
00184                   common_subs += c1;
00185                   change += c1;
00186                 }
00187 
00188               if (Mopti_do_copy_prop)
00189                 {
00190                   /* Handle copy propogation */
00191                   /*
00192                      c2 = L_local_rev_copy_propagation(cb);
00193                      copy_prop += c2;
00194                    */
00195                   c2 = L_local_copy_propagation (cb);
00196                   copy_prop += c2;
00197                   change += c2;
00198                 }
00199 
00200               j += 1;           /* iteration counter */
00201 
00202             }
00203           while ((c1 + c2 != 0) && (j != Mopti_imax_num_iterations));
00204 
00205         }
00206 
00207       k += 1;                   /* iteration counter */
00208 
00209     }
00210   while ((change != 0) && (k != Mopti_omax_num_iterations));
00211 
00212   if (Mopti_do_dead_code)
00213     L_combine_pred_defines (fn);
00214 
00215   if (Mopti_print_stats)
00216     {
00217       fprintf (stderr, "   Common subexpressions: %d\n", common_subs);
00218       fprintf (stderr, "   Copy propagations    : %d\n", copy_prop);
00219       fprintf (stderr, "   Dead code removed    : %d\n", dead_code);
00220       fprintf (stderr, "  --------------------------------------\n");
00221     }
00222 }
